subject: Retirement
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: David Cone, 45, said he has struggled to find a career niche after pitching for the Royals, the Mets, the Yankees, the Blue Jays and the Red Sox.
snippet: David Cone, 45, said he has struggled to find a career niche after pitching for the Royals, the Mets, the Yankees, the Blue Jays and the Red Sox.
